welcome:
Hello {0} :wave:

You receive this message because you are the owner of [**{1}**](https://discord.com/channels/{2}.

defaults.form_message_editor_description: Use the button below to open up the form.

only_owner.title: Only the server owner can use this command

confirm.title: Request Data Deletion
confirm.description:
We are sorry to hear that you are leaving Formify.

Using this command will delete all data related to **{0}**. Please make sure all following points are correct before confirming this deletion process:

Server: {0}
Owner: {1}

The following data will be deleted:

• Forms
• Form Fields
• Form Commands
• Form Messages

If you are really sure, you can perform the deletion via "Confirm deletion".

invalid_user_reference.title: Invalid User Reference
invalid_user_reference.description: Use the button on the initial form submission again.

invalid_message.title: Invalid Message
invalid_message.description: Use the button on the initial form submission again.

new_form_reply_dm.title: New Form Reply
new_form_reply_dm.description: You received a new message for one of your form submissions on [**{0}**](https://discord.com/channels/{1}).

dm.form_reply_thread_message_content: {0} sent a direct message to the user

success.title: Direct message sent successfully
success.description: Your message was successfully sent to the user.

error.title: Message could not be sent
error.description: The message could not be sent. The user may have turned off direct messaging.

could_not_be_converted.title: Form submission could not be converted
could_not_be_converted.description: Something went wrong, please try again later.

converted.title: Form submission converted successfully
converted.description: You can now download the form submission by clicking on the file in this message.

form_not_found.title: Form not Found
form_not_found.description: Looks like this form does not exist.

channel_not_found.title: Channel not Found
channel_not_found.description: Looks like this channel does not exist.

form_message_not_found.title: Form Message not Found
form_message_not_found.description: Looks like this form message does not exist.

form_field_not_found.title: Form Field not Found
form_field_not_found.description: Looks like the selected form field does not exist.

message_not_found.title: Message not Found
message_not_found.description: The message has already been deleted.

action_not_allowed.title: Not Allowed
action_not_allowed.description: You are not allowed to use this action.

something_went_wrong.title: Something went wrong
something_went_wrong.description: Looks like something went wrong with your request. If this error still occurs after retrying, use {0}.

already_linked.title: Already linked
already_linked.description: You already linked a slash command to this form. Use {0} instead.

invalid_length.title: Invalid Input
invalid_length.description: `name` must be 32 or fewer in length

invalid_format.title: Invalid Input
invalid_format.description: `name` is invalid. Use {0} to check your slash command name.

reserved.title: Invalid Input
reserved.description: `{0}` is a reserved name. You cannot use it.

invalid_length.title: Invalid Input
invalid_length.description: `description` must be 100 or fewer in length

success.title: Slash command created
success.description: You successfully linked `{0}` to form `{1}`. You can now use </{0}:{2}> to open this form.

no_command_found.title: No command found
no_command_found.description: Looks like there is no command linked to this form.

no_command_found.description: You have to create a command using {0}

success.title: Slash command updated
success.description: We successfully updated your slash command for *{0}*

limit_reached.description: You reached your form field limit. You can create up to 5 form fields.

label_invalid_length.description: `label` must be 45 or fewer in length

placeholder_invalid_length.title: Invalid Input
placeholder_invalid_length.description: `placeholder` must be 100 or fewer in length

invalid_input.title: Invalid input
invalid_input.description: You have to specifiy at least one item.

field_not_found.title: Invalid Input
field_not_found.description: We couldn't find this field in this form

invalid_length.description: `label` must be 45 or fewer in length

invalid_length.description: `placeholder` must be 100 or fewer in length

invalid.title: Invalid Input
invalid.description: You must adjust the defined field value to the new length limits to change `min_length`.

invalid.title: Invalid Input
invalid.description: You must adjust the defined field value to the new length limits to change `max_length`.

less_than.title: Invalid Input
less_than.description: The length of the form field `value` cannot be less than `min_length`

greater_than.title: Invalid Input
greater_than.description: The length of the form field `value` cannot be greater than `max_length`

field_not_found.title: Form field not found
field_not_found.description: Looks like this form field does not exist. Make sure to copy the right ID.

invalid_payload.title: Invalid Payload
invalid_payload.description: For a regex validator, a regex pattern must be specified.

could_not_be_created.title: Missing Permissions
could_not_be_created.description: The message could not be created. Usually this error message is triggered due to missing permissions

could_not_be_updated.title: Missing Permissions
could_not_be_updated.description: The message could not be updated. Usually this error message is triggered due to missing permissions

not_linked_to_form.title: Not Allowed
not_linked_to_form.description: Looks like this message is not linked to a form. You can only use this interaction on messages created with {0}

unable_to_enable_buttons.title: Something went wrong
unable_to_enable_buttons.description: An error occurred while attempting to enable the buttons.

unable_to_disable_buttons.title: Something went wrong
unable_to_disable_buttons.description: An error occurred while attempting to disable the buttons.

info.title: Edit Form Message
info.description: Use the tools below to edit the embed.

no_messages_found.title: No form messages found
no_messages_found.description: It looks like you haven't linked a message to this form yet. You can do this using {0}.

response.title: Edit a Form Message
response.description:
You can edit a form message by right clicking on it and select `Apps` → `Edit this message`. Below is a list of all your form messages that are linked to *{0}*.
{1}

missing_permissions.title: Missing Permissions
missing_permissions.description: I do not have permissions to send messages in the selected channel.

success.title: Message Created
success.description: The message has been created successfully. [Show message]({0})

info.title: Form Message Editor
info.description:
A FormMessage is a custom message through which users can call your form.

To give you as many options as possible, below this embed is a preview of your message, which you can edit using the controls below. Each embed field is available for editing. The disabled button is the one that is used to call up your form. You can edit this one using the optional fields on ${interaction.client.getCommandMention('form messages create')}.

When you are done editing, you can send the message by clicking "Create Message".

delete.title: Delete a form message
delete.description: To delete a created form message, simply delete the Discord message.

command.name: Command
command.value: Open your form through a command. To create one use {0}.

description.list:
Here is a list of all messages that are linked to this form. To edit one of them just click on *go to*, right click on the message and select `Apps` → `Edit this message`.
{0}
description.empty: You can link custom messages to this form using {0}.

value.list: Below is a list of all your form fields. To edit one of them use {0}.
value.empty: You have not added any fields to your form yet. Add your first field using {0}.

allowed_roles.name: Allowed Roles
allowed_roles.value:
Members need at least one of these roles to use this form:

{0}

blocked_roles.name: Blocked Roles
blocked_roles.value:
Members with any of the following roles **may not** use this form:

{0}

notify_roles.name: Notify Roles
notify_roles.value:
These roles receive a ping each time a new form is submitted:

{0}

ratelimit.title: Rate Limit
ratelimit.description: Prevent spam or control exactly how many submissions are allowed in a given time period.

forum_channel.title: Forum Channel Settings
forum_channel.description: The settings below are only relevant if your submission channel is a forum channel.

tags.name: Submission Tags
tags.value:
These tags are automatically added to new form submissions:

title_invalid_length.title: Invalid Input
title_invalid_length.description: `title` must be 45 or fewer in length

limit_reached.title: Form limit reached
limit_reached.description: You reached your form limit. You can create up to 25 forms.

created.title: Form created
created.description: Your form has been created successfully.

add_fields.name: Add form fields
add_fields.value: You can add form fields using {0} with `{1}` as form.

auto_create_not_allowed.title: Not Allowed
auto_create_not_allowed.description: To enable automatic creation of private channels, you must first specify a parent using {0}.

channel_must_be_forum.title: Channel must be a forum channel
channel_must_be_forum.description: The configured channel is not a forum channel. Use {0} to set a forum channel as your submission channel.

tag_mismatch.title: Select menu options are not up to date
tag_mismatch.description: There is a mismatch between the options of the select menu and the available tags of <#{0}>. Use this command again to get the latest options.

setup_required.title: Setup Required
setup_required.description: Rate limiting is not configured for this form. Use all three command arguments `enabled`, `amount` and `timespan` to setup rate limiting.

invalid_timespan.title: Invalid Timespan
invalid_timespan.description:
The `timespan` could not be formatted correctly. Please use the following format:

`45s` → *45 seconds*
`2m` → *2 minutes*
`4h` → *4 hours*
`1d` → *1 day*

unsubscribed.title: Unsubscribed
unsubscribed.description: We are sorry that you don't like this newsletter. You will not receive it in the future. If you change your mind, you can always subscribe again by using `/subscribe` on your server.

something_went_wrong.title: Something went wrong
something_went_wrong.description: You could not be unsubscribed from our newsletter. Try again later or send us a message using `/report`

missing_permissions.title: Missing Permissions
missing_permissions.description: In order to remove the form submitter from this channel, grant me the `Manage Roles` permission.

permission_overwrite_error.title: Something went wrong
permission_overwrite_error.description: An error occurred while trying to overwrite the permissions for this channel.

user_not_found.title: User not Found
user_not_found.description: The form submitter left the server.

form_not_found.description: Private channels can only be created for existing forms

success.title: Channel Created Successfully
success.description: Head over to {0} to start your conversation with {1}.

unable_to_fetch_guild_member.title: Unable to fetch guild member
unable_to_fetch_guild_member.description: This is an error on our side. Try again or report this issue using {0}.

unable_to_fetch_guild_roles.title: Unable to fetch guild roles
unable_to_fetch_guild_roles.description: I'm unable to fetch the guild roles. Make sure I have the right permissions and try again.

missing_permissions.title: Missing Permissions
missing_permissions.description: With my current permissions I'm unable to mange roles. Grant me the `Manage Roles` permission and try again.

unable_to_assign_managed_roles.title: Unable to Assign managed Roles
unable_to_assign_managed_roles.description:
Roles managed by an interaction cannot be assigned to users. Update your selection and try again.

Following roles in your selection are affected: {0}.

unable_to_assign.title: Some of the selected roles cannot be assigned
unable_to_assign.description:
Due to the role hierarchy, some of the selected roles cannot be assigned. The following roles are affected by this error: {0}.

Keep in mind, bot roles cannot be assigned at all. We filtered these out. Update the role hierarchy as shown below and try again.

has_thread.title: Not Allowed
has_thread.description: This message already has a thread

missing_permissions.title: Missing Permissions
missing_permissions.description: To create a Thread Channel I need the permission `Create Public Threads`.

not_allowed.title: Not Allowed
not_allowed.description: This button can only be used in public thread channels.

missing_permissions.title: Missing Permissions
missing_permissions.description: I need the `Manage Threads` permission to perform this action.

user_message.description:
Hello {0} :wave:

You receive this message because you are the owner of [**{1}**](https://discord.com/channels/{2}).

Thank you for adding Formify to your server. You are now ready to create your first form. Just follow these few steps.

getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.description: You added the bot but don't know how exactly to start now? Here are some useful tips for you!

create_form.name: :book: Create your Form
create_form.value: To begin, you need to create your first form using {0}. Each form needs a title and a channel where all submissions will be logged. The channel can be either a normal text channel or a thread. If you use a thread, <@945331235977310280> will always unarchive it automatically.

create_form_fields.name: :bookmark_tabs: Create Form Fields
create_form_fields.value: After you have created the form, you need to create fields with {0}. Fields are used to create the structure of the form. Select the form from the last step and add the data as described in the command structure. You can create up to 5 fields per form.

create_form_command.name: <:slash_command:947243655129862174> Create a Form Command
create_form_command.value: It's time to create a custom form command. Any user in your Discord can use this command to open your form and submit data. You can create your command using {0}.

ready.name: :confetti_ball: Ready to Go!
ready.value:
You are ready to go. Just use your command from the last step to open your form and submit data!

We hope you'll have a great experience with Formify and welcome you in our community!

data_deletion_completed.title: Deletion Completed
data_deletion_completed.description: All data related to your server has been successfully deleted. Formify will now leave the server.

thank_you.title: Thank you for your feedback
thank_you.description: If you have any detailed suggestions for improvement, feel free to use {0} to let us know.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description:
**User**
`{user}` -> User Mention
`{user.name}` -> Username + Tag
`{user.username}` -> Username
`{user.discriminator}` -> User Discriminator
`{user.avatar}` -> User Avatar URL

support.title: Are you looking for help?
support.description: Our [support server]({0}) is the best place for all formify questions. You can even participate in the development and suggest new features.

invite.title: Invite Formify
invite.description: To invite me to your Discord server, just open my profile and click `Add to Server`.

only_owner.title: Missing Permissions
only_owner.description: Only the server owner can subscribe to our newsletter

reasons.private_channel_member_removed: User removed through button interaction by {0} - {1}

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: The content of your message. You can use /variables here.

report.title: Report an Issue or give a Suggestion
